If yes, then you are welcome to visit\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://hero.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"our Hero badge page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". EPAM presents a new \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://hero.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"hero.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" project that helps you keep in touch with, and thank, your colleagues and co-workers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/828065e0-573b-42a4-81e2-c84df871b732/15.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":345,\"height\":238}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are new to EPAM, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://hero.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"hero.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" will have already noticed. Take a look at your profile in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - you already have at least one badge on your profile page.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cooperate and recognize the work of your colleagues - stay involved in the EPAM community.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
